title: Castle Rock Episode 8 - Promo Breakdown
author: Think Story
comment: Your videos are very well done. Good volume. Excellent pronunciation. Liking this new promo thing you are doing.
He looks so scary and massive in the scene with Molly where he’s sitting on the steps
Guess you read my mind! I was thinking the other day how great it would be if you also analyzed the trailers! And here it is! Thank you so much Daniel! We really appreciate it 🙏
Didn’t even realize those were the new owners. So excited for Wednesday!
You said it was young Henry who hears the schisma but wasn’t that Wendell on the bus?
description:
This is my new companion piece that breaks down the preview/promo for the next episodes of Castle Rock. This is for episode 8, "Past Perfect."

Check out the promo here:
